attributes.action: fund the D-Day Veterans to attend the 65th Anniversary of D-Day
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The MOD will not fund the approx 500 veterans to attend the 65th Anniversary of D-Day in France. This is a national disgrace as brave men laid down there lives for the freedoms we have today

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
